questions.question: The Velocity in a fluid flow is given as $$ V \ = \ 5x^3\hat{i} \ + \ 9x^2y\hat{j} \ + \ 3t\hat{k} $$. Find the velocity & acceleration at (2, 1, 2) at t=2
The Velocity in a fluid flow is given as $$ V \ = \ 5x^3\hat{i} \ + \ 9x^2y\hat{j} \ + \ 3t\hat{k} $$. Find the velocity & acceleration at (1, 2, 2) at t=2
